availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jordan R. Evans (Allen County, Kentucky, resident and farmer.)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Son of Boyd Evans and L. Evans. Married to Rebecca J. Cain Evans in Allen County, Kentucky, on May 10, 1858. Father of J. H. Evans and Margaret Ada Evans. Farm laborer in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 226A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, New Roe, p. 270.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, District No. 6, p. 255A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994091, Allen County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film 000216815.
